description: The Maple Honeycrisp Margarita Recipe is a twist on the traditional&nbsp;margarita recipe. The addition of maple syrup and fresh Honeycrisp apples will tantalize your taste buds and make you fall in love with this cocktail.
name: Maple Honeycrisp Margarita
recipeIngredient: 1 tbsp. Sugar or simple syrup, optional but recommended
Ice cubes to fill the glass you're using for serving

recipeInstructions.name: Fill a cocktail shaker with the tequila, Grand Marnier, apple cider, simple syrup, and ice and shake for 30 to 60 seconds until combined.
recipeInstructions.text: Fill a cocktail shaker with the tequila, Grand Marnier, apple cider, simple syrup, and ice and shake for 30 to 60 seconds until combined.

recipeInstructions.name: Fill a glass with crushed ice and Honeycrisp slices and pour the margarita over the top.
recipeInstructions.text: Fill a glass with crushed ice and Honeycrisp slices and pour the margarita over the top.

recipeInstructions.name: Coat the rim of each glass in maple syrup using a spoon or parchment paper. On a plate, stir together the sugar, cardamom, and cinnamon. Dip each glass in the sugar to coat.
recipeInstructions.text: Coat the rim of each glass in maple syrup using a spoon or parchment paper. On a plate, stir together the sugar, cardamom, and cinnamon. Dip each glass in the sugar to coat.

recipeInstructions.name: Pour the cocktail over the ice, then garnish each glass with two slices of Honeycrisp apple and serve immediately.
